import React from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faGithub, faReact, faJs, faHtml5, faCss3, faBootstrap, faDocker, faNodeJs, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import iconRedux from '../images/redux-60.png'; import iconJest from '../images/jest-60.png'; import iconMysql from '../images/mysql-60.png'; const COLORS = [ "#bbf7d0", "#99f6e4", "#bfdbfe", "#ddd6fe", "#f5d0fe", "#fed7aa", "#fee2e2" ]; const TAGS = [ "HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Typescript", "Tailwind", "React", "Next.js", "Gatsby", "UI/UX", "SVG", "animation", "webdev" ]; const DURATION = 15000; const ROWS = 5; const TAGS_PER_ROW = 5; const random = (min, max) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min; const shuffle = (arr) => [...arr].sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random()); const InfiniteLoopSlider = ({ children, duration, reverse = false }) => { return (
{children} {children}
); }; const Tag = ({ text }) => (
# {text}
); function Skills() { return (
